title: Imperial_Hash
author: Imperial_Hash
content: Hello everyone!Hope you all are doing well!My name is Pr1mal Cypher and I am the founder of ENCODE Graphics.I worked with many artists on this web3 project since 2020 and did a short storywith the person who initialized the famous Lambo meme...As I would love to create much more works for BITCOIN... and BTC related short stories,I would look for really amazing stories, that could be created as a comic story.Anyone here who knows a good one?You wanna share it?THANK YOU ALL!best,Primal

comments.author: Imperial_Hash
comments.body: How could you share it to make it easy for us to create the short story?1. LOGLINE (2-3 sentences what it is all about)2. OUTLINE (some sentences what happens from beginning to the end)3. MAIN CHARACTER/s (maybe a short description of the character)THANK YOU!Would love to hear some early day ones or just suggestions :-)

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Why not you start by creating one first since this is what you want others to go ahead in presenting you about their experiences, you should leave by example first then others will follow, also regarding your guidelines to this, I don't think you made it explanatory enough for easy readability, are images required in sighting any story or just the sentence required, lastly avoid post bursting by waiting for a reply before you make another post on thesame thread.

comments.author: Imperial_Hash
comments.body: Hope the (low res) images and story above is self explaining.OUTLINE: After J saw an interview with Alan Greenspan where he claimed you can't buy anything useful with Bitcoin, the Bitcoin enthusiast and early adopter wants to prove the world wrong. He buys a Lamborghini with Bitcoin and sets a milestone in crypto history and the world of memes.

comments.author: Imperial_Hash
comments.body: No images needed.Just a story in some sentences you think would be cool for a comic ora wonderful article... whatever works.THANKS

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: short story2012man under 30, sits at table in british pub. with social housing apartment blocks seen in window behind him. buying some btc cash in handwearing an IT technician uniform, name badge included[looks like a disgruntled employee gambling on his future]2022same guy in rooftop swimming pool of high class apartment of a exotic location, sunset and ocean in the backgroundsuit splayed on the sun lounger to the side. [looks relaxed and happy, early retirement is treating him well]to be continuednot much more needs saying

comments.author: buwaytress
comments.body: Nice. I see the main character looks a lot like Sweet Tooth (graphic novel I bought for kids just last year).Question: yeah I think Bitcoin users are bad ass, and those success stories (financially) are really bad ass too. I do know of one but a question first: you only take positive stories? We also have probably plenty of terribly bad stories which can also be really cool as comics.Something dumb but semi true:After being told he's a loser for posting his Bitcoin address as a QR code in reddit on memes, guy keeps doing it, getting banned, but somehow continues to receive small tips from fellow incels and randos.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: This is my story how I first get to know about bitcoin:I remember I was driving home from university when i heard in radio something like "FUN FACT - BTC is worth more than a dollar (1$). Can you imagine that? - someone made up his own currency and now it is worth more than a dollar? What a nonsense"I was like ... "What a nonsense" Who is buying coins that he (as centralized identity) can produce as much as he want. If I only spend 5 min after arriving home to do a research to know what is blockchain and why BTC gains popularity instead of mindlessly accepting the journalist's narrative ... I was too focused on chicks and alko-party.Next time I heard about BTC when it broke 10k $ A 10 000x after... I did research that day and my face was like:Why did I not do my research almost a decade ago! Made my first purchase at 19k $. F.king +1 900 000 % from "what a nonsense" day. At the top of 2017 bubble XD

comments.author: kennycarder
comments.body: Quote from: Imperial_Hash on December 07, 2022, 11:07:51 AMHello everyone!Hope you all are doing well!My name is Pr1mal Cypher and I am the founder of ENCODE Graphics.I worked with many artists on this web3 project since 2020 and did a short storywith the person who initialized the famous Lambo meme...As I would love to create much more works for BITCOIN... and BTC related short stories,I would look for really amazing stories, that could be created as a comic story.Anyone here who knows a good one?You wanna share it?THANK YOU ALL!best,Primalhttps://i.imgur.com/U41PN02.pngBitcoin has no story, it is just running automatically. Where there is a story, it must have a relationship with people, such as the FTT incident. The protagonist of the story will always be people's hearts. I would really like to see a plot about Bitcoin in TULSA KING. I think it fits the story very well. If there is, it will be a very cool thing. An old man faces life again and uses Bitcoin to rebuild his gangster empire.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: It would be nice to see the Satoshi Nakamoto story in a comic. From the starting point from the development of the code to the first mined block, and then how he disappears from the community. You will have to read and study a lot to make the story closer to reality, but if you do it right it would be a great comic.

comments.body: Quote from: seoincorporation on December 08, 2022, 02:27:09 AMIt would be nice to see the Satoshi Nakamoto story in a comic. From the starting point from the development of the code to the first mined block, and then how he disappears from the community. You will have to read and study a lot to make the story closer to reality, but if you do it right it would be a great comic.Great idea, a comic about the story of Satoshi Nakamoto from planning to perfection forming bitcoin from start to finish will be a very interesting comic to read.and all the stories are in accordance with actual reality, reading comics is fun what else is the story the same as what is being experienced or is being lived. And it can help spread bitcoin through comics as well as educate those who don't know or understand about bitcoin, and keep it as simple as possible and have some funny pictures and stories.
